title: Meta’s New AI Lab Delivers First Internal Models, CTO Reveals
description: Meta’s AI unit has produced its first internal models as Mark Zuckerberg bids to compete at the frontier. Meta Platforms’ newly formed artificial intelligence lab has delivered its first high-profile AI models internally, the company’s chief technology officer has said, according to Reuters.
content:

title: Digital agency Ascendancy taps into AI trends with platform launch
description: A Shropshire digital marketing agency has recently launched its own data platform, powered by artificial intelligence.
content:
Called 'Member Metrics', the move by Newport-based Ascendancy follows a successful year-long beta test with clients.
The firm said 2026 was expected to be the year that AI moves from experimentation to everyday business impact.

title: Artificial intelligence ruins its latest thing - this time, affordable computers
